main: ^Squeak... I always stay here and hide. No, I'm not eavesdropping or anything!
response: ^<size=35>I heard you say you were a
^. I wasn't listening on purpose, really!</size>

g-0: ^<size=35>Actually, I have a favour to ask? Even though you're a
^<size=35>Just figured asking an outsider would be easier, you know?</size>
^<size=35>If you're willing, could you help me defeat some enemies?</size>
^<size=35>I don't know how many would be good, though.  Maybe <color=yellow>5 enemies of any type</color> would be great for a start!</size>

already_accepted: ^She looks amazing as always...so strong...but I wish she would relax a little...
^<size=35>Oh, you're still here? I was thinking that getting rid of <color=yellow>5 enemies of any type</color> would be great!</size>
^<size=35>I might even get you that recommendation if you complete this favour.</size>
completed: ^<size=35>Oh my, blur old me! You've already done it! Thank you so much!

c-0: ^<size=35>I've got it! Done and over. Thanks for your help, human.</size>
^<size=35>I hope this made her day. But don't tell her about this! </size>You absolutely can't!

final: ^<size=35>Thanks for your help, human! But don't you dare say a word to her!</size>
